title: Is there something about you as a Person that your main wouldn't be a fan of?
body:
{{champion:82}} 
-unlike my name suggests I'm actually a rather benevolent kind of guy
-I do enjoy other types of Music other than Metal o:

But the most ironic thing is:
I have an Iron deficiency...
